comment.author: 20958381@N08
comment._content: Sorry I've been in NZ!! From everything I've read there is no tunnel (sadly!) Just a warren of cellars underneath - but we can live in hope that will be found one day :-) Secret tunnel stories abound in so many locations. For example there was said to be a secret tunnel that ran from Madame Brussels brothel in Little Lonsdale Street to Parliament House in Melbourne - I like that story too :-) With regards to the exterior I believe it's actually stayed pretty much the same except for being painted. For example see this 1945 image: nla.gov.au/nla.pic-vn4655368 There are so many of these plans from between 1900 to 1940s that show planned modifications of pubs in Sydney and not all of them actually happened. Unfortunately I haven't found an interior shots from the general period - I wonder if anyone else knows?
